Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Check client readiness for all clients on Commserver
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><INP_LIMIT class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">4</INP_LIMIT><INP_DELAY class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">2</INP_DELAY><INP_SUSPEND_WORKFLOW class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_SUSPEND_WORKFLOW><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII><INP_PAUSE_WF_IN_FOR_EACH class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_IN_FOR_EACH></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_CONDITIONAL_LOOP_TEST
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><val class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">0</val><VAR_CLIENT_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><VAR_CLIENT_READY class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><VAR_BREAK class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">false</VAR_BREAK><VAR_SET_BREAK class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</VAR_SET_BREAK><VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING><VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS><VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_FAIL_WF class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">no</VAR_FAIL_WF></variables>

children.displayName: Provide email address to send the workflow report
children.name: INP_EMAIL_ID

children.displayName: Provide number of times to run client readiness on each client
children.name: INP_LIMIT

children.displayName: Number of seconds to wait before running client readiness check
children.name: INP_DELAY

children.displayName: Pause workflow in wait for client process block->foreach sub block?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_WF_IN_FOR_EACH

children.displayName: Suspend workflow for all pause options?
children.name: INP_SUSPEND_WORKFLOW

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START [" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime} +"] : START WORKFLOW"); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : WAIT FOR CLIENT READY"); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="int val = workflow.getVariable("val") + 1;
workflow.setVariable("val", val);
logger.info("INFO: >>>>>>>>>>>> NEW VAL for val : [" + val + "]");
logger.info("INFO: VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} + "] ");
logger.info("INFO: VAR_BREAK [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_BREAK} + "]");
if (workflow.getVariable("val") > xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LIMIT} || xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} == null)
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_SET_BREAK","true");
 logger.info("INFO: VAR_SET_BREAK: [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_SET_BREAK") + "] ");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_BREAK", "true");
 logger.info("INFO: VAR_BREAK [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_BREAK") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: iterates a group of activities over a list of values
Activity.name: ForEach

Activity.description: if/else based decision
Activity.name: Decision

Activity.description: Add client to Client ready list
Activity.name: AddToList

condition.script: (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK}.isEmpty());
(xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} == null && xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK}.isEmpty());

Activity.description: Remove client from check list
Activity.name: RemoveFromList

Activity.name: AddToList

Activity.description: interrupts a process block execution
Activity.name: Break

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

condition.script: (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_SET_BREAK}.equals("true") || xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_3/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} == null || xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_3/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK}.isEmpty());
(!xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_SET_BREAK}.equals("true") && xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_3/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_3/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK}.isEmpty());

Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><commCell /><query>SELECT TOP 3 name FROM App_client WHERE name !='NO CLIENT' and specialClientFlags=0 </query></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_STATUS}</INP_STATUS><INP_JOBID class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}</INP_JOBID><INP_WORKFLOW_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}</INP_WORKFLOW_NAME><INP_START_TIME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</INP_START_TIME><INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE}</INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED") || xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_fail_workflow}.equals("yes"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", "Workflow Failed to execute, as one of the list validation failed.");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="if (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENT_READY} == "" || xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENT_READY} == null)
{
 logger.info("ERROR : None of the clients is Ready. List VAR_CLIENT_READY is empty");
 if (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY} == "" || xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY} == null)
 {
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF","yes");
 logger.info("INFO : Setting VAR_FAIL_WF to [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF") + "]");
 }
}
else
{
 logger.info("INFO : Ready clients : [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENT_READY} + "] ");
}
" /></inputs>

Activity.description: utility to clear a list
Activity.name: ClearList

condition.script: (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY}.isEmpty());
(xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK}.isEmpty());

Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="if (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENT_READY} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENT_READY}.isEmpty() )
{
 logger.info("ERROR : Failed to clear list VAR_CLIENT_READY");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF","yes");
 logger.info("INFO : Setting VAR_FAIL_WF to [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF") + "]");
}
logger.info("INFO : VAR_CLIENT_READY = [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENT_READY} + "]");

if (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY}.isEmpty())
{
 logger.info("ERROR : Failed to clear list VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF","yes");
 logger.info("INFO : Setting VAR_FAIL_WF to [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF") + "]");
}
logger.info("INFO : VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY = [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_NOT_READY} + "]");

if (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK}.isEmpty())
{
 logger.info("ERROR : Failed to clear list VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF","yes");
 logger.info("INFO : Setting VAR_FAIL_WF to [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FAIL_WF") + "]");
}
logger.info("INFO : VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK = [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CLIENTS_READY_CHECK} + "]");" /></inputs>
